description: Auriant Mining AB engages in the exploration and production of mineral gold. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 558 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2005-03-29. The company has four sites, including two producing mines, one early stage exploration property and one advanced exploration asset, namely Tardan, Solcocon, Uzhunzhul and Kara-Beldyr. The firm has around 10 wholly owned subsidiaries, including the directly held Tardan Gold LLC, LLC GRE 324, LLC Solococon, LLC Rudtechnologiya, LLC Guld Borzya, LLC Management Company CAG and LLC Burservice, the indirectly held LLC Uzhunzhul and LLC CAG Promstroy, and Kara-Beldyr.
name: Auriant Mining AB
